text: Pins Are Lucky is a 1914 silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Billy Bowers - Cyrus Singleton * Frances Ne Moyer - Ruth Singleton * Oliver Hardy - Peter Pelton (as O.N. Hardy) * Raymond McKee - John Cozens ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:Films directed by Frank Griffin Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: Pins Are Lucky
